title: Guaranteed Price Drops, fresh Kroh now $72/slab
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Guaranteed Price Drops, fresh Kroh now $72/slab
posts.post_content:
there is a hidden reserve.

For sale are two Krohs.  The initial price will be $100 each.

After 5 days on August 21st, the price will be reduced to $95 each.

After 10 days on August 26th, the price will be reduced to $90 each,

and so forth every five days.

At some point, without a bid, one or both cards may disappear having reached the hidden reserve.  If you wait, it could be too late.  The above outlined price drops will be in effect at high noon CDT on the day stated.  Bids before noon will be considered at the pre-noon price.

Shipping is included in the pricing.

Lets take a look at the Krohs:

First an Excellent (5) example graded by BVG with a Piedmont back

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/17250/kroh[/IMG]

Second a very good (3) example graded by PSA with a Cycle 350 back.  SALE PENDING

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10458/kroh-cycle[/IMG] 

Any form of payment is accaptable.  $3 will be added for regular PP only, the fee is on you if you want the "protection".

$15 off on the remaining Kroh if purchased before my birthday.  

Make my day.:D

Well you missed my birthday, but I will forgive you.

Let me know if you want the card for $80 shipped or feel free to make an offer.

I'm all ears.
